candidates.title: prepare for publishing to crates.io
candidates.body:
Prepare for publishing to crates.io.

Signed-off-by: Jiang Liu <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>

candidates.title: Enhance storage subsystem for coming features and fixes several bugs
candidates.body:
Enhance storage subsystem for coming features and fixes several bugs:
1) fix bugs related to compressed cache file and chunk digest validation etc
2) prepare for support non-continous compressed blob data
3) refine the way to decompress data

candidates.title: upgrade clap to 4.0
candidates.body:
In order to use derive API to refactor, we upgrade clap firstly.

Signed-off-by: Wenyu Huang <huangwenyuu@outlook.com>

candidates.title: Refine storage device abstraction and implementation
candidates.body: Refine storage device abstraction and implementation

candidates.title: optimize prefetch table for workload
candidates.body:
Now, nydus prefetch files with the order of index. This method is not accurate. We already get accessed files list for workload. Hence, we can prefetch files based on the order they are accessed.

Prefetch table for rafs v5 image (`nydus-image inspect` for rafs v6 is not work, repairing...):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20137756/197762887-a4909fd6-85f7-4310-b4a4-67f8014eb766.png)
Accessed files:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20137756/197751991-3520b0e0-40ca-433d-a323-416f8b55137c.png)

Now, we avoid sorting prefetch table, maybe add a parameter for this option.

This PR is addressing the step 1 of #807 
Related to https://github.com/containerd/nydus-snapshotter/pull/228

Signed-off-by: Bin Tang <tangbin.bin@bytedance.com>

candidates.title: release: update version on build automatically
candidates.body:
We only need to git tag to release a version without modifying
the version field in Cargo.toml and Cargo.lock.

Signed-off-by: Yan Song <imeoer@linux.alibaba.com>

candidates.title: Add gzip decoder to enable converting tar.gz into rafs
candidates.body: Add gzip decoder to enable converting tar.gz into rafs

candidates.title: api: reduce dependencies when used by client
candidates.body:
When the nyuds-api crate is used by client, it only cares about data types defined by the API, so we should get rid of extra/unnecessary dependencies.

Signed-off-by: Jiang Liu <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>

candidates.title: Unify fusedev and virtiofs frontend
candidates.body:
Add fuse and virtiofs to daemon subcommand.

Signed-off-by: uran0sH <huangwenyuu@outlook.com>

candidates.title: Reduce dependency
candidates.body:
Before reduction:
root@0bba89291a46:/nydus# cargo build --features=fusedev
   Compiling nydus-app v0.3.0 (/nydus/app)
   Compiling nydus-api v0.1.1 (/nydus/api)
   Compiling nydus-storage v0.5.0 (/nydus/storage)
^C  Building [=======================> ] 264/274: nydus-app(build.rs), nydus-api, nydus-storage      

After
                       
root@0bba89291a46:/nydus# cargo build --features=fusedev
    Updating crates.io index
   Compiling time v0.3.14
   Compiling nydus-api v0.1.1 (/nydus/api)
   Compiling flexi_logger v0.23.3
   Compiling nydus-app v0.3.0 (/nydus/app)
   Compiling nydus-storage v0.5.0 (/nydus/storage)
^C  Building [======================>  ] 248/259: nydus-app(build.rs), flexi_logger, nydus-storage, nydus-api

candidates.title: release: update version on build automatically
candidates.body:
We only need to git tag to release a version without modifying
the version field in Cargo.toml and Cargo.lock.

Signed-off-by: Yan Song <imeoer@linux.alibaba.com>

candidates.title: release: prepare for v2.1.0-rc.3.1

candidates.title: dep: update dbs-uhttp to v0.3.1
candidates.body:
Update dbs-uhttp to v0.3.1, which solves some mio related bugs.

Signed-off-by: Jiang Liu <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>

candidates.title: storage: fix compile error
candidates.body:
Compiling storage alone will fail.
```
error[E0432]: unresolved import `tokio::time`
  --> storage/src/cache/worker.rs:12:12
   |
12 | use tokio::time::interval;
   |            ^^^^ could not find `time` in `tokio`

error[E0432]: unresolved import `tokio::time`
  --> storage/src/factory.rs:24:5
   |
24 |     time,
   |     ^^^^ no `time` in the root

```

Signed-off-by: wanglei01 <wllenyj@linux.alibaba.com>
